column_description: the id of the match api
the id of the home team api
the id of the away team api
the goal of the home team
the goal of the away team
the shot on goal of the match
value_description:
commonsense reasoning: 
A shot on goal is a shot that enters the goal or would have entered the goal if it had not been blocked by the goalkeeper or another defensive player.

column_description: the shot off goal of the match, which is the opposite of shot on
the fouls occurred in the match
the cards given in the match
Balls sent into the opposition team's area from a wide position in the match
Ball goes out of play for a corner kick in the match
The duration from a player taking over the ball in the match
